trans-unit.source: Carries argument name information for the decorated class.
trans-unit.target: Hordoz magában, ha a leírással ellátott osztály argumentum neve adatai.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ConstructorArgumentAttribute"></xref> class, initializing the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ConstructorArgumentAttribute.ArgumentName*> property.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ConstructorArgumentAttribute"> </xref> osztály inicializálása a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ConstructorArgumentAttribute.ArgumentName*>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.ConstructorArgumentAttribute.ArgumentName*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that contains the argument name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> , amely tartalmazza az argumentum neve.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representing the argument name.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> képviselő az argumentum neve.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> representing the argument name.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> képviselő az argumentum neve.
